alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 2:13AM PST until January 23 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Los Angeles County Beaches and Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
